title: Lexington Boy Taken To Hospital After Accidental Shooting
content:
LEXINGTON, Ky. (LEX 18) - A Lexington boy was sent to the hospital after police say he accidentally shot himself.
It happened just after 11 Thursday night on Lindberg Drive. Police say the juvenile had the gun and accidentally fired a shot. He walked to a nearby church to ask for help and was taken to the hospital.
Thankfully, his injuries were minor.
